class.name: DojoQuery
class.brief_description: A query builder for Dojo entities.
class.description: The DojoQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching entities from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by world addresses, models, and clauses.

method.name: add_world
method.description: Adds a world address to the query.

method.name: hashed_keys
method.description: Sets whether to use hashed keys in the query.

method.name: historical
method.description: Sets whether to include historical data in the query.

method.name: models
method.description: Sets the models to filter by.

method.name: with_clause
method.description: Adds a clause to the query for more complex filtering. [codeblock] var query = DojoQuery.new() query.with_clause( # Filter by keys KeysClause.new( ["0x123...", "0x456..."], ["0xabc...", "0xdef..."], "dojo_starter-Moves" ) ) [/codeblock]

method.name: world_addresses
method.description: Sets the world addresses to filter by.
